Build-Depends: debhelper-compat (= 13), dh-sequence-python3, pybuild-plugin-pyproject, python3, python3-docutils, python3-poetry-core, python3-pydantic, python3-setuptools, python3-typer, python3-typeshed, python3-typing-extensions
Description: Validator for reStructuredText documents with code blocks rstcheck validates the syntax of reStructuredText documents. Unlike other validators, it will also verify syntax correctness in nested code blocks for a variety of languages: . * Bash shell scripts * Doctest * C (C99) * C++ (C++11) * JSON * XML * Python * reStructuredText . rstcheck can also validate Sphinx documentation files if Sphinx is installed.
